string.text: Well, you're a wimp, Tagged help you are zero. So gratitude from us you will not wait. Not thank you for that.
Not bad, Stalker, shoot the mutants. But the particular speed you're no different, so if you want to go - will have to pay.
Well Bullseye, you really helped us greatly. Let's assume that you've paid for your pass. You can go to the Bar.
Let them get closer so no one is left. I shoot first - then you.
Stalker, you're in territory controlled Debt. Any aggression will be punished.
All welcome!! Says the Outpost of the Debt on the Landfill. From the Dark valley towards the Bar there is a wave of mutants. Anyone who is committed to shoot vermin - appreciation with our guarantee.
Stalker, you're on the grounds of the Debt. Going to whoop it up - get a 4 th degree of disability !
Well done guys, we defeated them. All the rest, and you Stalker, come here and chat.

The people, causing the commander of neutrals. We drove the bandits from the Parking lot abandoned equipment, suggesting a retaliatory counterattack. We have little strength, so you are welcome to help.
